title: Castlevania.Lords.of.Shadow.2.Repack-z10yded
description:
Castlevania.Lords.of.Shadow.2.Repack-z10yded


Year: 2014
Genre: Action (Slasher) / 3D / 3rd Person
Publication Type: Repack
Language: English / Russian
Language: English
Crack: ALI213 SteamEmu

System requirements:

OS: Windows XP / 7/8
Processor: 2.4Ghz Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Video: Direct X9 compatible video card 512Mb RAM
DirectX : Version 9
Hard Drive: 7 GB available space

"He who fights with monsters will not be able to keep yourself to 
yourself do not become a monster."-Friedrich Nietzsche 

The first part of the saga of Castlevania: Lords of Shadow revealed 
the secret of the Belmont clan. In the continuation of the history 
you face new challenges and unexpected plot twists. In the final grand 
saga Dracula returns - weakened and eager to get rid of the shackles 
of immortality. However, a new threat will make a great vampire look 
for ways to regain their strength. The key to this - in his own castle. 
But do not hurry to write off the Belmont clan ...

Features repack
- Cut: nothing
- Recoded: nothing
- Game Version 1.0.0.1 (Update 1)
- Installation time ~ 9 minutes 

- Additional content:
+ Armored Dracula Costume
+ Dark Dracula Costume
+ Relic Rune Pack
+ Revelations
